segment.source: Enhanced Touchscreen Gestures #
segment.target: Enhanced Touchscreen Gestures #

segment.source: Authors: Joseph Lee, Kefas Lungu
segment.target: Authors: Joseph Lee, Kefas Lungu

segment.source: This add-on provides additional touchscreen gestures for NVDA. It also provides a set of gestures for easier browse mode navigation.
segment.target: This add-on provides additional touchscreen gestures for NVDA. It also provides a set of gestures for easier browse mode navigation.

segment.source: Note: this add-on requires NVDA 2024.1 or later running on a touchscreen computer with Windows 10 or 11.
segment.target: Note: this add-on requires NVDA 2024.1 or later running on a touchscreen computer with Windows 10 or 11.

segment.source: Commands
segment.target: Commands

segment.source: Available everywhere
segment.target: Available everywhere

segment.source: 4 finger double tap: toggle input help mode.
segment.target: 4 finger double tap: toggle input help mode.

segment.source: Four finger flick right: toggle touch keyboard (usually enables it).
segment.target: Four finger flick right: toggle touch keyboard (usually enables it).

segment.source: Four finger flick left: toggle dictation (Windows+H; Windows 10 Version 1709 or later).
segment.target: Four finger flick left: toggle dictation (Windows+H; Windows 10 Version 1709 or later).

segment.source: 4 finger flick up: report title of the current window.
segment.target: 4 finger flick up: report title of the current window.

segment.source: 4 finger flick down: report status bar text.
segment.target: 4 finger flick down: report status bar text.

segment.source: 3 finger flick down: read current window.
segment.target: 3 finger flick down: read current window.

segment.source: 3 finger flick left: report object with focus.
segment.target: 3 finger flick left: report object with focus.

segment.source: 3 finger flick right: report current navigator object.
segment.target: 3 finger flick right: report current navigator object.

segment.source: 3 finger double tap: Cycles through speech symbol levels which determine what symbols are spoken
segment.target: 3 finger double tap: Cycles through speech symbol levels which determine what symbols are spoken

segment.source: 2 finger tripple tap: Quit NVDA!.
segment.target: 2 finger tripple tap: Quit NVDA!.

segment.source: 4 finger tap: Cycles through audio ducking modes.
segment.target: 4 finger tap: Cycles through audio ducking modes.

segment.source: Triple tap: Toggles between beeps, speech, beeps and speech, and off.
segment.target: Triple tap: Toggles between beeps, speech, beeps and speech, and off.

segment.source: Web touch mode
segment.target: Web touch mode

segment.source: This touch mode, available in browse mode, allows you to navigate the document by selected element. To switch to web mode, from browse mode documents, perform 3 finger tap. From this mode, flicking up or down with one finger cycles through available element navigation modes, while flicking right or left with one finger moves to next or previous chosen element, respectively. Once you move away from browse mode documents, object touch mode is used.
segment.target: This touch mode, available in browse mode, allows you to navigate the document by selected element. To switch to web mode, from browse mode documents, perform 3 finger tap. From this mode, flicking up or down with one finger cycles through available element navigation modes, while flicking right or left with one finger moves to next or previous chosen element, respectively. Once you move away from browse mode documents, object touch mode is used.

segment.source: Available web modes are: Default, Links, Buttons, Form fields, Headings, Frames, Tables, Lists, Graphics, and Landmarks.
segment.target: Available web modes are: Default, Links, Buttons, Form fields, Headings, Frames, Tables, Lists, Graphics, and Landmarks.

segment.source: Synth settings touch mode
segment.target: Synth settings touch mode

segment.source: You can use this mode to quickly change synthesizer settings such as choosing a voice and changing volume. In this mode, use two finger flick left or right to move between synth settings and use two finger flick up and down gestures to change values. This gestures mirrors that of synth settings ring commands on the keyboard.
segment.target: You can use this mode to quickly change synthesizer settings such as choosing a voice and changing volume. In this mode, use two finger flick left or right to move between synth settings and use two finger flick up and down gestures to change values. This gestures mirrors that of synth settings ring commands on the keyboard.

segment.source: Version 25.07
segment.target: Version 25.07

segment.source: Made the add-on code more robust with help from Pyright (a Python static type checker).
segment.target: Made the add-on code more robust with help from Pyright (a Python static type checker).

segment.source: Version 25.02
segment.target: Version 25.02

segment.source: Restored limited support for Windows 8.1.
segment.target: Restored limited support for Windows 8.1.

segment.source: Version 25.01
segment.target: Version 25.01

segment.source: Download links for add-on releases are no longer included in add-on documentation. You can download the add-on from NV Access add-on store.
segment.target: Download links for add-on releases are no longer included in add-on documentation. You can download the add-on from NV Access add-on store.

segment.source: Switched linting tool from Flake8 to Ruff and reformatted add-on modules to better align with NVDA coding standards.
segment.target: Switched linting tool from Flake8 to Ruff and reformatted add-on modules to better align with NVDA coding standards.

segment.source: Removed support for automatic add-on updates feature from Add-on Updater add-on.
segment.target: Removed support for automatic add-on updates feature from Add-on Updater add-on.

segment.source: Version 24.05
segment.target: Version 24.05

segment.source: NVDA 2024.1 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2024.1 or later is required.

segment.source: Version 23.06.1
segment.target: Version 23.06.1

segment.source: audio ducking moved to 4 finger tap due to conflict with speech stops NVDA command.
segment.target: audio ducking moved to 4 finger tap due to conflict with speech stops NVDA command.

segment.source: Version 23.06
segment.target: Version 23.06

segment.source: Enhanced Touch gestures nvda-addon is now maintained by Kefas Lungu.
segment.target: Enhanced Touch gestures nvda-addon is now maintained by Kefas Lungu.

segment.source: All gestures in object mode are now available everywhere.
segment.target: All gestures in object mode are now available everywhere.

segment.source: New gestures are now available.
segment.target: New gestures are now available.

segment.source: 3 finger double tap: Cycles through speech symbol levels which determine what symbols are spoken
segment.target: 3 finger double tap: Cycles through speech symbol levels which determine what symbols are spoken

segment.source: 2 finger tripple tap: Quit NVDA!.
segment.target: 2 finger tripple tap: Quit NVDA!.

segment.source: 4 finger tap: Cycles through audio ducking modes.
segment.target: 4 finger tap: Cycles through audio ducking modes.

segment.source: Triple tap: Toggles between beeps, speech, beeps and speech, and off.
segment.target: Triple tap: Toggles between beeps, speech, beeps and speech, and off.

segment.source: In web mode, it is now possible to Use buttons, graphics, and landmarks in addition to the already available browse element list.
segment.target: In web mode, it is now possible to Use buttons, graphics, and landmarks in addition to the already available browse element list.

segment.source: In web mode, NVDA is no longer going to say normal, but default when you switch to default navigation from other browse element list. For example, when switching from buttons, NVDA will now say default.
segment.target: In web mode, NVDA is no longer going to say normal, but default when you switch to default navigation from other browse element list. For example, when switching from buttons, NVDA will now say default.

segment.source: Version 23.02
segment.target: Version 23.02

segment.source: NVDA 2022.4 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2022.4 or later is required.

segment.source: Windows 10 21H2 (November 2021 Update/build 19044) or later is required.
segment.target: Windows 10 21H2 (November 2021 Update/build 19044) or later is required.

segment.source: Version 23.01
segment.target: Version 23.01

segment.source: NVDA 2022.3 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2022.3 or later is required.

segment.source: Windows 10 or later is required as Windows 8.1 is no longer supported by Microsoft as of January 2023.
segment.target: Windows 10 or later is required as Windows 8.1 is no longer supported by Microsoft as of January 2023.

segment.source: It is possible to reassign touch keyboard and dictation toggle commands from input gestures dialog under Enhanced Touch Gestures category.
segment.target: It is possible to reassign touch keyboard and dictation toggle commands from input gestures dialog under Enhanced Touch Gestures category.

segment.source: Removed read-only state workaround for touch keyboard keys as it is resolved in Windows 10.
segment.target: Removed read-only state workaround for touch keyboard keys as it is resolved in Windows 10.

segment.source: Version 22.03
segment.target: Version 22.03

segment.source: NVDA 2021.3 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2021.3 or later is required.

segment.source: A warning message will be displayed when attempting to install the add-on on Windows 7, 8, and 8.1.
segment.target: A warning message will be displayed when attempting to install the add-on on Windows 7, 8, and 8.1.

segment.source: Version 21.10
segment.target: Version 21.10

segment.source: NVDA 2021.2 or later is required due to changes to NVDA that affects this add-on.
segment.target: NVDA 2021.2 or later is required due to changes to NVDA that affects this add-on.

segment.source: Version 21.08
segment.target: Version 21.08

segment.source: Initial support for Windows 11.
segment.target: Initial support for Windows 11.

segment.source: Version 21.01
segment.target: Version 21.01

segment.source: NVDA 2020.3 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2020.3 or later is required.

segment.source: On Windows 10 Version 1709 and later, doing a four finger flick left will toggle dictation (Windows+H).
segment.target: On Windows 10 Version 1709 and later, doing a four finger flick left will toggle dictation (Windows+H).

segment.source: Remove dedicated touch interaction support toggle command from the add-on.
segment.target: Remove dedicated touch interaction support toggle command from the add-on.

segment.source: As touch interaction support can be toggled from NVDA's touch interaction settings panel, a dedicated Enhanced Touch Gestures settings panel has been removed.
segment.target: As touch interaction support can be toggled from NVDA's touch interaction settings panel, a dedicated Enhanced Touch Gestures settings panel has been removed.

segment.source: Version 20.09
segment.target: Version 20.09

segment.source: Removed ability to let NVDA turn off touch interaction for up to ten seconds (touch command passthrough).
segment.target: Removed ability to let NVDA turn off touch interaction for up to ten seconds (touch command passthrough).

segment.source: Removed coordinate announcement beep feature.
segment.target: Removed coordinate announcement beep feature.

segment.source: Version 20.07
segment.target: Version 20.07

segment.source: Added a keyboard command to toggle touch interaction or enable/disable touch passthrough (Control+Alt+NVDA+T).
segment.target: Added a keyboard command to toggle touch interaction or enable/disable touch passthrough (Control+Alt+NVDA+T).

segment.source: As NVDA 2020.1 and later includes a touch command to perform right mouse click (one finger tap and hold), the command has been removed from this add-on. AS a result, NVDA 2020.1 or later is required.
segment.target: As NVDA 2020.1 and later includes a touch command to perform right mouse click (one finger tap and hold), the command has been removed from this add-on. AS a result, NVDA 2020.1 or later is required.

segment.source: The ability to let NVDA turn off touch interaction for up to ten seconds (touch command passthrough) is deprecated. In the future this feature will toggle touch interaction instead.
segment.target: The ability to let NVDA turn off touch interaction for up to ten seconds (touch command passthrough) is deprecated. In the future this feature will toggle touch interaction instead.

segment.source: In NVDA development snapshots, due to touch interaction feature changes, touch command passthrough feature and Enhanced Touch Gestures settings panel will be disabled. The command used to enable touch command passthrough will toggle touch interaction instead.
segment.target: In NVDA development snapshots, due to touch interaction feature changes, touch command passthrough feature and Enhanced Touch Gestures settings panel will be disabled. The command used to enable touch command passthrough will toggle touch interaction instead.

segment.source: Coordinate announcement beep feature is deprecated and will be removed in a future add-on release.
segment.target: Coordinate announcement beep feature is deprecated and will be removed in a future add-on release.

segment.source: Coordinate announcement beep will not be heard while using touch keyboard.
segment.target: Coordinate announcement beep will not be heard while using touch keyboard.

segment.source: NVDA will no longer appear to do nothing or play error tones while exploring modern input facility such as emoji panel via touch.
segment.target: NVDA will no longer appear to do nothing or play error tones while exploring modern input facility such as emoji panel via touch.

segment.source: NVDA will present an error message if touch keyboard cannot be activated (four finger flick right).
segment.target: NVDA will present an error message if touch keyboard cannot be activated (four finger flick right).

segment.source: Version 20.06
segment.target: Version 20.06

segment.source: Resolved many coding style issues and potential bugs with Flake8.
segment.target: Resolved many coding style issues and potential bugs with Flake8.

segment.source: Version 20.04
segment.target: Version 20.04

segment.source: Right mouse click gesture (one finger tap and hold) is now part of NVDA 2020.1.
segment.target: Right mouse click gesture (one finger tap and hold) is now part of NVDA 2020.1.

segment.source: Version 20.01
segment.target: Version 20.01

segment.source: NVDA 2019.3 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2019.3 or later is required.

segment.source: Touch support toggle command (including touch passthrough) will no longer function if touch support is turned off completely.
segment.target: Touch support toggle command (including touch passthrough) will no longer function if touch support is turned off completely.

segment.source: Version 19.11
segment.target: Version 19.11

segment.source: Added input help messages for additional touch commands.
segment.target: Added input help messages for additional touch commands.

segment.source: Version 19.09
segment.target: Version 19.09

segment.source: Touch support can now be disabled from everywhere, not just from profiles other than normal profile.
segment.target: Touch support can now be disabled from everywhere, not just from profiles other than normal profile.

segment.source: Version 19.07
segment.target: Version 19.07

segment.source: Internal changes to support future NVDA releases.
segment.target: Internal changes to support future NVDA releases.

segment.source: Version 18.12
segment.target: Version 18.12

segment.source: Internal changes to support future NVDA releases.
segment.target: Internal changes to support future NVDA releases.

segment.source: Version 18.08
segment.target: Version 18.08

segment.source: Compatible with NVDA 2018.3 and future versions.
segment.target: Compatible with NVDA 2018.3 and future versions.

segment.source: Version 18.06
segment.target: Version 18.06

segment.source: Add-on settings is now found in new multi-category NVDA Settings screen under "Enhanced Touch Gestures" category. As a result, NVDA 2018.2 is required.
segment.target: Add-on settings is now found in new multi-category NVDA Settings screen under "Enhanced Touch Gestures" category. As a result, NVDA 2018.2 is required.

segment.source: Fixed compatibility issues with wxPython 4.
segment.target: Fixed compatibility issues with wxPython 4.

segment.source: Version 18.04
segment.target: Version 18.04

segment.source: Resolves an issue where touch interaction category in NVDA Settings panel may cause error sounds to be heard due to changes made from this add-on.
segment.target: Resolves an issue where touch interaction category in NVDA Settings panel may cause error sounds to be heard due to changes made from this add-on.

segment.source: Version 18.03
segment.target: Version 18.03

segment.source: NVDA 2018.1 is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2018.1 is required.

segment.source: Because NVDA 2018.1 comes with touch typing checkbox, the checkbox is no longer included in this add-on.
segment.target: Because NVDA 2018.1 comes with touch typing checkbox, the checkbox is no longer included in this add-on.

segment.source: Version 17.12
segment.target: Version 17.12

segment.source: Requires NVDA 2017.4. Specifically, this add-on can now handle configuration profile switches.
segment.target: Requires NVDA 2017.4. Specifically, this add-on can now handle configuration profile switches.

segment.source: As NVDA 2017.4 includes screen orientation announcement, this feature is no longer part of this add-on.
segment.target: As NVDA 2017.4 includes screen orientation announcement, this feature is no longer part of this add-on.

segment.source: Added a hidden checkbox in Touch Interaction dialog to completely disable touch support (available if profiles other than normal configuration is active).
segment.target: Added a hidden checkbox in Touch Interaction dialog to completely disable touch support (available if profiles other than normal configuration is active).

segment.source: If using NVDA 2018.1 or later, Touch Interaction dialog will be listed twice under NVDA's preferences menu. The second item is the dialog that comes with the add-on.
segment.target: If using NVDA 2018.1 or later, Touch Interaction dialog will be listed twice under NVDA's preferences menu. The second item is the dialog that comes with the add-on.

segment.source: In Touch Interaction dialog for the add-on, touch typing mode is no longer shown if using NVDA 2018.1 or later.
segment.target: In Touch Interaction dialog for the add-on, touch typing mode is no longer shown if using NVDA 2018.1 or later.

segment.source: Version 17.10
segment.target: Version 17.10

segment.source: Due to support policy from Microsoft, Windows 8 (original release) is no longer supported.
segment.target: Due to support policy from Microsoft, Windows 8 (original release) is no longer supported.

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce screen orientation twice when running NVDA 2017.4 development snapshots.
segment.target: NVDA will no longer announce screen orientation twice when running NVDA 2017.4 development snapshots.

segment.source: Version 17.07.1
segment.target: Version 17.07.1

segment.source: Added an option in touch interaction dialog to manually toggle touch passthrough without use of a timer.
segment.target: Added an option in touch interaction dialog to manually toggle touch passthrough without use of a timer.

segment.source: With manual passthrough mode off, if touch passthrough is turned on before the passthrough duration expires, touch interaction would be enabled.
segment.target: With manual passthrough mode off, if touch passthrough is turned on before the passthrough duration expires, touch interaction would be enabled.

segment.source: Version 17.07
segment.target: Version 17.07

segment.source: Added a new dialog named Touch Interaction under NVDA's preferences menu to configure how NVDA works with touchscreens.
segment.target: Added a new dialog named Touch Interaction under NVDA's preferences menu to configure how NVDA works with touchscreens.

segment.source: After installing this version, when pressing keys on the touch keyboard, one must double tap the desired key. You can switch back to the old way by enabling touch typing from Touch Interaction dialog.
segment.target: After installing this version, when pressing keys on the touch keyboard, one must double tap the desired key. You can switch back to the old way by enabling touch typing from Touch Interaction dialog.

segment.source: Added a command (unassigned) to allow NVDA to ignore touch gestures for up to 10 seconds.
segment.target: Added a command (unassigned) to allow NVDA to ignore touch gestures for up to 10 seconds.

segment.source: Added an option in Touch Interaction dialog to allow NVDA to pause touch interaction between 3 to 10 seconds in order to perform touchscreen gestures directly (as though NVDA is not running; default is 5 seconds).
segment.target: Added an option in Touch Interaction dialog to allow NVDA to pause touch interaction between 3 to 10 seconds in order to perform touchscreen gestures directly (as though NVDA is not running; default is 5 seconds).

segment.source: Added debug logging messages when performing right clicks (tap and hold) to be recorded in the NVDA log (requires NVDA 2017.1 or later).
segment.target: Added debug logging messages when performing right clicks (tap and hold) to be recorded in the NVDA log (requires NVDA 2017.1 or later).

segment.source: Due to changes made when playing screen coordinates, NVDA 2017.1 or later is required.
segment.target: Due to changes made when playing screen coordinates, NVDA 2017.1 or later is required.

segment.source: ##Version 17.03
segment.target: ##Version 17.03

segment.source: Fixed an issue where coordinate announcement beep did not play or an error tone played instead when using NVDA 2017.1 or later.
segment.target: Fixed an issue where coordinate announcement beep did not play or an error tone played instead when using NVDA 2017.1 or later.

segment.source: ##Version 16.12
segment.target: ##Version 16.12

segment.source: Web touch mode works in Microsoft Edge, Microsoft Word and others where browse mode is used.
segment.target: Web touch mode works in Microsoft Edge, Microsoft Word and others where browse mode is used.

segment.source: Added lists and landmarks to web touch mode elements.
segment.target: Added lists and landmarks to web touch mode elements.

segment.source: Version 16.06
segment.target: Version 16.06

segment.source: Initial stable version.
segment.target: Initial stable version.
